mapper.sql: fUuid AS uuid, fAlgorithmTestTaskUuid AS algorithmTestTaskUuid, fContactPerson AS contactPerson, fTopTenCount AS topTenCount, fZeroOptimizedCount AS zeroOptimizedCount, fRankChangeRate AS rankChangeRate, fRecordDate AS recordDate, fCreateTime AS createTime, fUpdateTime AS updateTime
mapper.select: INSERT INTO t_algorithm_test_result_statistics ( fAlgorithmTestTaskUuid, fContactPerson, fTopTenCount, fZeroOptimizedCount, fRankChangeRate, fRecordDate) SELECT att.fUuid AS 'algorithmTestTaskUuid', c.fContactPerson AS 'contactPerson' , SUM(IF(ck.fCurrentPosition <= 10, 1, 0)) AS 'topTenCount', SUM(IF(ck.fOptimizedCount = 0, 1, 0)) AS "zeroOptimizedCount", concat(CONVERT (SUM(IF(ck.fCurrentPosition <= 10, 1, 0)) / count(1)*100,DECIMAL(10,2)),'%') AS 'fRankChangeRate', NOW() FROM t_customer_keyword ck, t_algorithm_test_task att, t_customer c WHERE ck.fStatus = 1 AND att.fCustomerName = c.fContactPerson AND ck.fCustomerUuid = c.fUuid GROUP BY ck.fCustomerUuid
